MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL22 postcode area of Abergele, affecting properties in Tan Y Gopa and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:58am. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 10am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:59am on 12th April 2021.
